top_comments.comment: So many good DIY projects 👏♥ I really liked the mason jars and napkins holder!
I enjoyed all this thrift find diys Christina. My favourites have to be the decorative books and the napkin holders. Beautiful diys on all ❤

comments_since_last_sample.body: Thank you for these ideas! Simple,  elegant and budget friendly without the overload of plastic mass produced stuff. I loved the sweater ornaments.
